multiplechoiceresponse.p: Which command(s) used to retrieve messages from a stream support the use of a COUNT modifier?:
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Choose one answer:

choicegroup.choice: Neither command supports the use of a COUNT modifier.

div.p: Both XRANGE and XREAD support the use of the COUNT modifier to specify the maximum number of messages to read from the stream in a given command invocation.
